price: 39. Tolkayow! Noloshan Adduunka waa uun raaxo (yar oo tageysa), Aakhiradaana ah Daarta negaadiga.
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنَّمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَتَٰعٞ وَإِنَّ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ هِيَ دَارُ ٱلۡقَرَارِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāqawmi innamā hādhihi al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā matāʿun wa-inna al-ākhirata hiya dāru al-qarāri
